   21: 
   22: -module(ssl_sni_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   30: 
   31: %% Callback functions
   32: -export([all/0,
   33:          groups/0,
   34:          init_per_suite/1,
   35:          end_per_suite/1,
   36:          init_per_group/2,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   40: 
   41: %% Testcases
   42: -export([no_sni_header/1,
   43:          sni_match/1,
   44:          sni_no_match/1,
   45:          no_sni_header_fun/1,
   46:          sni_match_fun/1,
   47:          sni_no_match_fun/1,
   48:          dns_name/1,
   49:          ip_fallback/1,
   50:          no_ip_fallback/1,
   51:          dns_name_reuse/1,
   52:          customize_hostname_check/0,
   53:          customize_hostname_check/1,
   54:          sni_no_trailing_dot/0,
   55:          sni_no_trailing_dot/1,
   56:          hostname_trailing_dot/0,
   57:          hostname_trailing_dot/1
   58:         ]).
   59: 
   60: %% Apply export
   61: -export([send_and_hostname/1,
   62:          recv_and_certificate/1
   63:         ]).
   64: 
   65: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 6}).
   66: 
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: 
   71: all() ->
   72:     [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   73:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   74:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   75:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   76:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   77:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   78:     ].
   79: 
   80: groups() ->
   81:     [
   82:      {'tlsv1.3', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   83:      {'tlsv1.2', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   84:      {'tlsv1.1', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   85:      {'tlsv1', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   86:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   87:      {'dtlsv1', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   88:      {sni_tests, [parallel], sni_tests()}
   89:     ].
   90: 
   91: sni_tests() ->
   92:     [no_sni_header, 
   93:      sni_match, 
   94:      sni_no_match,
   95:      no_sni_header_fun, 
   96:      sni_match_fun, 
   97:      sni_no_match_fun,
   98:      dns_name,
   99:      ip_fallback,
  100:      no_ip_fallback,
  101:      dns_name_reuse,
  102:      customize_hostname_check,
  103:      sni_no_trailing_dot,
  104:      hostname_trailing_dot].
  105: 
  106: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  107:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  108:     try application:start(crypto) of
  109:         ok ->
  110:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  111:             Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  112:             {#{server_config := ServerConf,
  113:                client_config := ClientConf},
  114:              #{server_config := LServerConf,
  115:                client_config := LClientConf}} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_sni_configs(),
  116:             %% RSA certs files needed by *dot cases
  117:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert([{client_opts, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf]},
  118:                                         {client_local_opts, [{verify, verify_peer} | LClientConf]},
  119:                                         {sni_server_opts, [{sni_hosts, [{Hostname, ServerConf}]} | LServerConf]}
  120:                                        | Config0])
  121:     catch _:_  ->
  122:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  123:     end.
  124: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  125:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  126: 
  127: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  128:    ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  129: 
  130: end_per_suite(_) ->
  131:     ssl:stop(),
  132:     application:stop(crypto).
  133: 
  134: init_per_testcase(customize_hostname_check, Config) ->
  135:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  136:     %% ssl_test_lib:clean_start(keep_version),
  137:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  138:     Config;
  139: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  140:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  141:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  142:     ?CT_LOG("Ciphers: ~p~n ", [ ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version)]),
  143:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  144:     Config.
  145: 
  146: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  147:     Config.
  148: 
  149: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  150: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  151: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  152: no_sni_header(Config) ->
  153:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  154:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  155:     ClientOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  156:                                               proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  157:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, undefined).
  158: 
  159: no_sni_header_fun(Config) ->
  160:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  161:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  162:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, []) end,
  163:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  164:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  165:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  166:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, undefined).
  167: 
  168: sni_match(Config) ->
  169:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  170:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  171:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  172:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  173:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, HostName).
  174: 
  175: sni_match_fun(Config) ->
  176:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  177:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  178:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, undefined) end,
  179:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  180:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  181:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  182:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, HostName).
  183: 
  184: sni_no_match(Config) ->
  185:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  186:     [_ | DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  187:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  188:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  189:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config),
  190:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName).
  191: 
  192: sni_no_match_fun(Config) ->
  193:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  194:     [{sni_hosts, _}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  195:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config),
  196:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  197:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  198:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName).
  199: 
  200: dns_name(Config) ->
  201:     Hostname = "OTP.test.server",
  202:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  203:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  204:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  205:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  206:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  207:                                           peer => [{extensions,  [#'Extension'{extnID =
  208:                                                                                    ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  209:                                                                                extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname}],
  210:                                                                                critical = false}]},
  211:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]},
  212:                                     client_chain =>
  213:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  214:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  215:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  216:     Opts = proplists:get_value(group_opts, Config),
  217:     VersionTuple = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  218:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ServerOpts0,
  219:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ClientOpts0,
  220: 
  221:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], undefined, Config),
  222:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer},
  223:                                      {server_name_indication, Hostname} | ClientConf], undefined, Config),
  224:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer}, {server_name_indication, "foo"} | ClientConf],
  225:                           undefined, Config),
  226:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer}, {server_name_indication, disable} | ClientConf],
  227:                         undefined, Config).
  228: 
  229: ip_fallback(Config) ->
  230:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  231:     {ok, #hostent{h_addr_list = [IP |_]}} = inet:gethostbyname(net_adm:localhost()),
  232:     IPList = tuple_to_list(IP),
  233:     IPStr  = lists:flatten(integer_to_list(hd(IPList)) ++ [io_lib:format(".~w", [I]) || I <- tl(IPList)]),
  234:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  235:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  236:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  237:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  238:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  239:                                           peer => [{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID =
  240:                                                                                   ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  241:                                                                               extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname},
  242:                                                                                            {iPAddress, IPList}],
  243:                                                                               critical = false}]},
  244:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]},
  245:                                     client_chain =>
  246:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  247:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  248:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  249: 
  250:     Opts = proplists:get_value(group_opts, Config),
  251:     VersionTuple = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  252:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ServerOpts0,
  253:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ClientOpts0,
  254: 
  255:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], Hostname, Config),
  256:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IP, Config),
  257:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IPStr, Config),
  258:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], list_to_atom(Hostname), Config).
  259: 
  260: no_ip_fallback(Config) ->
  261:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  262:     {ok, #hostent{h_addr_list = [IP |_]}} = inet:gethostbyname(net_adm:localhost()),
  263:     IPList = tuple_to_list(IP),
  264:     IPStr  = lists:flatten(integer_to_list(hd(IPList)) ++ [io_lib:format(".~w", [I]) || I <- tl(IPList)]),
  265:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  266:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  267:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  268:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  269:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  270:                                           peer => [{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID =
  271:                                                                                   ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  272:                                                                               extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname}],
  273:                                                                               critical = false}]},
  274:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  275:                                                   ]},
  276:                                     client_chain =>
  277:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  278:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  279:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  280: 
  281:     Opts = proplists:get_value(group_opts, Config),
  282:     VersionTuple = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  283:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ServerOpts0,
  284:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ClientOpts0,
  285: 
  286:     successfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], Hostname, Config),
  287:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IP, Config),
  288:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IPStr, Config).
  289: 
  290: dns_name_reuse(Config) ->
  291:     SNIHostname = "OTP.test.server",
  292:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  293:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  294:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  295:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  296:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  297:                                           peer => [{extensions,  [#'Extension'{extnID =
  298:                                                                                    ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  299:                                                                                extnValue = [{dNSName, SNIHostname}],
  300:                                                                                critical = false}
  301:                                                                  ]},
  302:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  303:                                                   ]},
  304:                                     client_chain =>
  305:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  306:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  307:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  308: 
  309:     Opts = proplists:get_value(group_opts, Config),
  310:     VersionTuple = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  311:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ServerOpts0,
  312:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ClientOpts0,
  313: 
  314:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  315: 
  316:     unsuccessfull_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], undefined, Config),
  317: 
  318:     Server =
  319: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  320: 				   {from, self()},
  321: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  322: 				   {options, ServerConf}]),
  323:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  324:     Client0 =
  325: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  326:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  327: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  328:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{verify, verify_peer},
  329:                                                               {server_name_indication, SNIHostname} | ClientConf]}]),
  330:     receive
  331:         {Server, _} ->
  332:             ok
  333:     end,
  334: 
  335:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  336: 
  337:     %% Make sure session is registered
  338:     ct:sleep(1000),
  339: 
  340:     Client1 =
  341: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
  342:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  343:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  344:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf]}]),
  345: 
  346:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client1, handshake_failure),
  347:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0).
  348: 
  349: 
  350: customize_hostname_check() ->
  351:     [{doc,"Test option customize_hostname_check."}].
  352: customize_hostname_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  353:     Ext = [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  354:                         extnValue = [{dNSName, "*.example.org"}],
  355:                         critical = false}
  356:           ],
  357:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  358:       client_config := ClientOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(rsa, [{server_chain,
  359:                                                                                [[], 
  360:                                                                                 [],
  361:                                                                                 [{extensions, Ext}]
  362:                                                                                ]}], 
  363:                                                                         Config, "https_hostname_convention"),
  364:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts0, Config),
  365:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts0, Config),  
  366:                                         
  367:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  368:   
  369:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  370:                                         {host, Hostname},
  371: 					{from, self()}, 
  372: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  373: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  374:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  375:     
  376:     CustomFun = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname_match_fun(https),
  377:     
  378:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  379:                                         {host, Hostname},
  380: 					 {from, self()}, 
  381:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  382:                                         {options,
  383:                                          [{verify, verify_peer},
  384:                                           {server_name_indication, "other.example.org"},
  385:                                           {customize_hostname_check, 
  386:                                            [{match_fun, CustomFun}]} | ClientOpts]
  387: 					 }]),    
  388:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  389:     
  390:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  391:                                         
  392:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  393:                                                {host, Hostname},
  394:                                                {from, self()}, 
  395:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  396:                                                {options, [{verify, verify_peer},
  397:                                                           {server_name_indication, "other.example.org"} | ClientOpts]}
  398:                                               ]),    
  399:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client1, handshake_failure).
  400: 
  401: sni_no_trailing_dot() ->
  402:       [{doc,"Test that sni may not include a triling dot"}].
  403: sni_no_trailing_dot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  404:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  405:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(sni_server_opts, Config),
  406: 
  407:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  408: 
  409:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  410:                                  {from, self()},
  411:                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  412:                                  {options, [ServerOpts]}]),
  413: 
  414:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  415: 
  416:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  417: 					      {host, Hostname},
  418: 					      {from, self()},
  419:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  420: 					      {options,
  421:                                                [{server_name_indication, Hostname ++ "."} | ClientOpts]}]),
  422:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unrecognized_name).
  423: 
  424: hostname_trailing_dot() ->
  425:     [{doc,"Test that fallback sni removes trailing dot of hostname"}].
  426: 
  427: hostname_trailing_dot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  428:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  429:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(sni_server_opts, Config),
  430:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname0} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  431: 
  432:     case trailing_dot_hostname(Hostname0) of
  433:         {ok, Hostname} ->
  434:             Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  435:                                                 {from, self()},
  436:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  437:                                                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
  438:             Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  439:             Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  440:                                                 {host, Hostname},
  441:                                                 {from, self()},
  442:                                                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  443:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
  444: 
  445:             ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  446: 
  447:             ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  448:             ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
  449:         {skip, _ } = Skip ->
  450:             Skip
  451:     end.
  452: 
  453: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  454: %% Callback Functions ------------------------------------------------
  455: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  456: send_and_hostname(SSLSocket) ->
  457:     ssl:send(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  458:     case  ssl:connection_information(SSLSocket, [sni_hostname]) of
  459: 	{ok, [{sni_hostname, Hostname}]} ->
  460: 	    Hostname;
  461: 	{ok, []} ->
  462: 	    undefined
  463:     end.
  464: 
  465: recv_and_certificate(SSLSocket) ->
  466:     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  467:     {ok, PeerCert} = ssl:peercert(SSLSocket),
  468:     #'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = #'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = {rdnSequence, Subject}}} 
  469: 	= public_key:pkix_decode_cert(PeerCert, otp),
  470:     ?CT_LOG("Subject of certificate received from server: ~p", [Subject]),
  471:     rdn_to_string(rdnPart(Subject, ?'id-at-commonName')).
  472: 
  473: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  474: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
  475: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  476: basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, Expected) ->
  477:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  478:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {?MODULE, send_and_hostname, []}},
  479:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  480:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  481:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  482:                                         {host, HostName}, {from, self()},
  483:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, recv_and_certificate, []}},
  484:                                         {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOptions]}]),
  485:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Expected, Client,  "server Peer cert"),
  486:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  487:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  488: 
  489: basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName) ->
  490:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  491:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  492:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  493:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  494:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  495:                                               {host, HostName}, {from, self()},
  496:                                               {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOptions]}]),
  497:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client, handshake_failure),
  498:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  499:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  500: 
  501: successfull_connect(ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Hostname0, Config) ->  
  502:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname1} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  503:     Hostname = host_name(Hostname0, Hostname1),
  504:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  505:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  506:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  507:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  508:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  509:                                         {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  510:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  511:                                         {options, ClientOptions}]),
  512:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  513:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  514:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  515: 
  516: unsuccessfull_connect(ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Hostname0, Config) ->
  517:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname1} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  518:     Hostname = host_name(Hostname0, Hostname1),
  519:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  520: 					      {from, self()},
  521: 					      {options, ServerOptions}]),
  522:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  523:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  524: 					      {host, Hostname},
  525: 					      {from, self()}, 
  526: 					      {options, ClientOptions}]),
  527:     
  528:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  529: 
  530: host_name(undefined, Hostname) ->
  531:     Hostname;
  532: host_name(Hostname, _) ->
  533:     Hostname.
  534: 
  535: trailing_dot_hostname(HostName) ->
  536:     case lists:member($., HostName) of
  537:         true ->
  538:             case lists:last(HostName) =/= $. of
  539:                 true ->
  540:                     {ok, HostName ++ "."};
  541:                 false ->
  542:                     {ok, HostName}
  543:             end;
  544:         _ ->
  545:             {skip, "Trailing dot conf not possible"}
  546:      end.
  547: 
  548: ssl_recv(SSLSocket, Expect) ->
  549:     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, "", Expect).
  550: 
  551: ssl_recv(SSLSocket, CurrentData, ExpectedData) ->
  552:     receive
  553:         {ssl, SSLSocket, Data} ->
  554:             NeweData = CurrentData ++ Data,
  555:             case NeweData of
  556:                 ExpectedData ->
  557:                     ok;
  558:                 _  ->
  559:                     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, NeweData, ExpectedData)
  560:             end;
  561:         Other ->
  562:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  563:     after 4000 ->
  564:             ct:fail({timeout, CurrentData, ExpectedData})
  565:     end.
  566: 
  567: rdnPart([[#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type=Type, value=Value} | _] | _], Type) ->
  568:     Value;
  569: rdnPart([_ | Tail], Type) ->
  570:     rdnPart(Tail, Type);
  571: rdnPart([], _) ->
  572:     unknown.
  573: 
  574: rdn_to_string({utf8String, Binary}) ->
  575:     erlang:binary_to_list(Binary);
  576: rdn_to_string({printableString, String}) ->
  577:     String.
